name: Invesco Low Volatility Portfolio ETF
longDescription: PLV seeks to generate capital growth and modest income over the long-term by investing directly or indirectly primarily in global equity securities and fixed-income securities. In order to achieve its investment objective, PLV invests primarily in Invesco portfolios that are either listed on a Canadian or U.S. stock exchange. The Invesco portfolios that provide equity exposure and are eligible for inclusion in PLV are those that Invesco Advisers determines to have low volatility or standard deviation of returns compared to their respective broader regional equity benchmarks. The Invesco portfolios that provide fixed income exposure and are eligible for inclusion in PLV are those that Invesco Advisers determines to have low volatility or standard deviation of returns compared to the broader Canadian fixed-income benchmark.
fulldescription: PLV seeks to generate capital growth and modest income over the long-term by investing directly or indirectly primarily in global equity securities and fixed-income securities. In order to achieve its investment objective, PLV invests primarily in Invesco portfolios that are either listed on a Canadian or U.S. stock exchange. The Invesco portfolios that provide equity exposure and are eligible for inclusion in PLV are those that Invesco Advisers determines to have low volatility or standard deviation of returns compared to their respective broader regional equity benchmarks. The Invesco portfolios that provide fixed income exposure and are eligible for inclusion in PLV are those that Invesco Advisers determines to have low volatility or standard deviation of returns compared to the broader Canadian fixed-income benchmark. The Invesco portfolios held by PLV are the Underlying Funds for PLV.
fullAddress: 5140 Yonge Street, Suite 900, Toronto, ON, CA
